RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 53. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOT PATOOTIE forwardly placed outside, took over in the three path turning for home, clear past the furlong marker, slight drift, held the runner up safe late while under brisk handling. KATIE'S C forwardly placed for almost four furlongs inside, fell back a bit late in the turn, moved to the outside for the drive, closing the gap on the winner late. DARING DARIAN in the second flight outside in the run up the backstretch, four wide into the turn, moved in then steered back out to the three path entering the stretch, roused, narrowly up for the show while between horses at the wire, not a threat to the top two. JUST ANOTHER WIN also in the second group, two path into the lane, one paced through the lane to narrowly miss the show. A P HUMOR behind the leaders, steered out to be four wide turning for home, lacked a closing kick to also narrowly miss the third spot. ANIME DAY took command soon after the start, showed the way into the turn, faltered in the drive. MAVE RUNNER rank, took up at the start to spot the field several lengths, was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: A P Humor
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind leaders, steered four wide into lane, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Katie's C
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward inside, moved out, coming late

ENTRY.NAME: Mave Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank, took up start, trailed well back

ENTRY.NAME: Just Another Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced 2p, missed show

ENTRY.NAME: Anime Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command after start, pace 2p, faltered drive

ENTRY.NAME: Daring Darian
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, 4w turn,steered in, out 3w, nod show btwn

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Patootie
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed outside, took over 3w, slight drift, held late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 21000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000, For Each $2,500 To $20,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BILOXI in mid pack in the run up the backstretch while well wide, four wide bid in the turn, clear into the lane, steadily increased that advantage under steady handling to prove clearly best. TARAASHOQ void of speed, raced four wide and behind the leader through the turn, reached closest to that one inside the furlong marker while drifting in,no late gain, well clear of the others. MO CREDO behind the early pace off the inside, moved to briefly challenged three wide and inside the winner midway on the turn, saw that progress stall into the lane, up late for the show while not a threat to the top pair. ZAICI broke through the gate prior to the start, reloaded in good order, broke in good order, clear out of the chute, continued to show the way into the turn, began to weaken by late in the bend when headed by the winner. CHICKEN TRUCK underwent a shoe repair in the paddock, checked up when bothered at the start to be last away, continued to lack speed turn, improved position while not a serious threat. TRADER PRICE made little impact in failing to menace. GOLDUSTER closest to the early leader off the inside, began a steady retreat before a half. VIKING LEGACY forwardly placed n the run up the backstretch, challenged between horses in the turn then gave way in the drive. ZULTAN broke out, bothered CHICKEN TRUCK, raced in mid pack briefly, finished before a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Zultan
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bothered foe, finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Chicken Truck
ENTRY.COMMENT: shoe repair paddock, bothered start, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Trader Price
ENTRY.COMMENT: made little impact in failing to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Credo
ENTRY.OWNER: Thompson Racing LLC (Stephen Thompson) and OM Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind early pace, bid btwn 3w turn, stalled, up late show

ENTRY.NAME: Zaici
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk thru gate, ran off 1/8, clear early, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Taraashoq
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 4w turn, drifted in stretch, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Biloxi
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack well wide, 4w bid turn, clear into the lane,clearly best

ENTRY.NAME: Golduster
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to the early leader, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Viking Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, bid turn, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TDZ CORRIENDA STAR put a head in front before a quarter from between horses, vied through the turn while closest to the inside of the first flight, pulled away through the lane under a steady hand ride to win ridden out. GYPSY JACKPOT with the early pace while outside the winner, battled with that one through the turn, proved no match in the drive, edged clear for the place. GLAMOROUS STAR off the early pace well wide up the backstretch, advanced into a contending position four down to three wide turn, chased the winner past the furlong marker in proving no match, outkicked late for the runner up position. PENNIES FOR PAULLA in mid pack outside, raced four wide through the turn, went evenly down the lane in lacking a closing response. TAKING PICTURES void of speed while wide, five path through most of the turn, failed to muster a rally. SUNSET FLASH prompted the early pace, fell back through the turn and had little for the drive. MARDI GRAS GORMLEY last to leave, lacked speed while a bit slow to settle, was not a factor. ELLA'S BABY broke back, moved briefly up to mid pack then was finished before a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Ella's Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, moved up to mid pack, finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Mardi Gras Gormley
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, bit slow to settle, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Tdz Corrienda Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: put head in front 9/16,vied turn, pulled away, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Gypsy Jackpot
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the early pace, no match, edged clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Sunset Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, little left drive

ENTRY.NAME: Pennies for Paulla
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, four wide turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Taking Pictures
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 5w turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Glamorous Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: off early pace well wide, 4-3w turn, closer, chased,outkicked 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Turf CR: 101. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER ON THE TURF. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 19, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since March 19, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WOODS N WATER unhurried early, crept closer in the second flight into the far turn, asked three wide midway on that bend, challenged on the outside entering the stretch, kicked clear then held the runner up safe late. PLAY MO forwardly placed off the inside, continued to race in a challenging position second turn, shifted to the far outside nearing the furlong marker, finished willingly to be getting to the winner late. SPEAKTOMEOFLOVE broke alertly, clear into the first turn just off the inside, set a pressured pace up the backstretch and into the far turn, vied into the stretch closest to the inside, could not match the top two the final furlong, saved the show. COSMIC TRAIN lacked speed off the inside, bothered in the far turn in traffic,moved out a bit to be four wide into the lane, improved position. IZZY'S BABY BOY prompted the early pace, pressed that leader the middle half, vied between foes and inside the winner into the lane then began to weaken. M AND M'S CUSTOM settled off the early pace in the second flight off the inside, checked up in some traffic far turn, fell back and did not recover. NORTHERNREFLECTION broke back, lacked speed, bothered far turn in traffic, failed to muster a rally after recovering. GET THEM JUSTIN in mid pack for a half, fell back and did not menace. BALLINONABUDJET was never a factor. VENN steadied at the start to race back early, improved with a middle move the third quarter, failed to sustain that advance and then gave way in the drive while in some traffic.

ENTRY.NAME: Ballinonabudjet
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Get Them Justin
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack for a half, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Speaktomeoflove
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, clear early, pressured pace middle 1/2, saved show

ENTRY.NAME: Northernreflection
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, bothered 3/8, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Play Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward off rail, shifted out stretch, come gain late

ENTRY.NAME: Woods N Water
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closer 3w far turn, asked, outside bid, clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Orange Grove Thoroughbreds, Inc. & Richard Painter

ENTRY.NAME: Venn
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied start, mild mid move, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Izzy's Baby Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted early, pressed middle half, weakened drive

ENTRY.NAME: M and M's Custom
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, checked far turn, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Cosmic Train
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, bothered 3/8, 4w 1/4, improved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MICHAEL'S BAD BOY within striking distance from the start outside, moved closer and challenged four wide into the far turn, showed the way into the stretch, clear past the furlong marker, held the runner up safe late under brisk handling. FORGED IN STEEL never far back while in the three path, challenged inside the winner far turn, fell back off that one into and through upper stretch, coming again late while staying clear for the place. JOEY'S GAME in the second flight while toward the inside, asked along midway on the second turn, steered out four wide into the lane, finished willingly to be getting to the top pair late. BIG BROTHER lacked speed off the rail, moved into a striking position four wide turning for home, flattened out through the stretch. WHEELS TURNING broke back, lacked speed well wide, five to six wide through the final turn, improved position while too late. CLEVER PRINCE settled off the pace, went evenly through the lane in lacking a closing response. UNBRIDLED PULPIT fell back after breaking with the field, picked off a couple of tiring rivals while never a threat. SNEAKY ALLIE KAT last to leave, trailed most of the way and was never a factor. DEMON HUNTER set or forced the pace closest to the inside for six furlongs and gave way. CALLEN FEELS GOOD also with the pace, narrowly showed the way up the backstretch off the inside and also faltered when the real running began turning for home.

ENTRY.NAME: Sneaky Allie Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed most of way

ENTRY.NAME: Clever Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridled Pulpit
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back after start, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Demon Hunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: set or forced pace, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Joey's Game
ENTRY.OWNER: Peterson Stephen J and Necaise Suzette
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight toward rail, asked 2nd turn, steered 4w, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Forged in Steel
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, 3w and btwn foes 2nd, getting to winner late

ENTRY.NAME: Callen Feels Good
ENTRY.COMMENT: narrowly set early pace, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Big Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, closer 4w 1/4, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Michael's Bad Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, 4w bid 2nd turn, clear, held late

ENTRY.NAME: Wheels Turning
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, 5-6w 2nd turn, improved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 7 1/2F Turf CR: 62. Maiden Claiming Purse 18000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY PAL SWEET broke on top, showed the way into the first turn, set a pressured pace up the backstretch while closest to the inside of the first flight and while rating kindly, shook clear when straightened for home, held the the next two safe under a right handed crop. NO YIELD last away, raced back, five to six wide when beginning to rally second turn, continued willingly down the lane to be closing the gap on the winner and hold sway for the place. ZIPPY TOGA void of speed toward the inside, saved some ground through the second turn, improved position down the lane when clear. MOTANAAFER also allowed the pace to go early, five wide into the lane when improving, drifted out and flattened out the final furlong. FLYING CAROLINA forwardly placed along the inside, continued inside far turn, boxed in late in that bend, went evenly through the lane when clear for the drive. SWEET PRESENT settled in mid pack, lacked response drive. CHILI RED four wide in the first turn, continued forward and outside, weakened through the stretch. ALL TOGETHER chased the winner early, vied briefly with that one the middle half and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Zippy Toga
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, inside 2nd turn, traffic, improved when clear

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Present
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, lacked response stretch

ENTRY.NAME: No Yield
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, raced back, 5-6w 2nd turn, willingly, late gain

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Carolina
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed inside, boxed 2nd turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: My Pal Sweet
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace, rated, shook clear, held late

ENTRY.NAME: Motanaafer
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed pace to go, 5w into lane, closer, drifted out, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: All Together
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, briefly vied, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Chili Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w 1st turn, forward, weakened drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TENSAS BERTIE behind the pace in the three path and under light restraint up the backstretch, moved out a bit and ranged up five wide to a challenging position turn, took over into the lane, larger advantage with less than a sixteenth to run, enough left to hold off the runner up. GRACE HAZEL prompted the early leader off the rail, shuffled back in traffic and three wide turn, asked four wide into the lane, coming again late. MISS ST. CLAIRE in the second flight out in the strip, moved to the front while four wide and inside the winner in the turn, narrowly showed the way into the stretch, could not last, saved the show. PORTO DEL ACE back off the pace well wide, five wide into the turn behind the winner, followed that one into the lane, staged a mild rally without posing a serious threat. STARSHIP NOLA last to leave, trailed early in lacking any early foot, improved position with some belated interest. TONI'S M sprinted clear after the start, set the pace toward the inside, continued to vie into the stretch while confronted, weakened the final furlong. SHE'S WAYNE'S remained back in failing to menace. CALCITE closest to the early leader toward the inside, stopped after a half. HALO'S SONG was never involved, far back, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Halo's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved, far back, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Calcite
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, stopped, well back

ENTRY.NAME: She's Wayne's
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Grace Hazel
ENTRY.OWNER: Guidry MD George Gary Guidry Ruth Delahoussaye Eddie and Delahoussaye Juanita
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted, shuffled turn 3w, coming again late

ENTRY.NAME: Tensas Bertie
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind pace 3p and in hand, ranged up 5w turn, took over,lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Miss St. Claire
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, 4w turn, bid, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Nola
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Porto Del Ace
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, 5w 3/8, mild rally

ENTRY.NAME: Toni's M
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear and toward the inside, pace,faltered final furlong

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 37000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 19, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRUNT broke sharp and took command, showed the way up the backstretch comfortably in hand, continued to set the pace turn, cruised home under a steady hand ride to win ridden out. SAMMY DANSEUR JR. in mid pack early, moved closer into the stretch three wide and on the outside, could do little with the winner the final furlong, edged clear for the second spot. CUSTOM BLUE GRASS forwardly placed while outside the winner, lacked a closing punch for that one, outkicked for the place. HOME VISIT chased the winner from along the inside for a half and began to tire. BIND FAITH last to leave, never menaced. SADIE'S LIGHT finished early, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Home Visit
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Blue Grass
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, lacked closing punch stretch off rail

ENTRY.NAME: Grunt
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, took command, all the pace, cruised homne

ENTRY.NAME: Bind Faith
ENTRY.COMMENT: last to leave, did not menace

ENTRY.NAME: Sammy Danseur Jr.
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, closer into the stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Sadie's Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, trailed home

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE FIVE B'S forwardly up the backstretch in the three path, advanced out of the turn to challenge nearing the furlong marker, put a head in front, dug in late when confronted by the runner up from the outside to narrowly prevai. IN DETAIL broke back, lacked speed in mid pack off the inside, came four wide for the drive outside the winner, challenged that one late to narrowly miss. G E H GIANTS WAY broke well, cleared early to set the pace inside, continued to hold the advantage turn and into the lane, offered some resistance to the winner when confronted by that one entering the stretch then proved no match for that one or the runner up, comfortably finished well in front of the others. PALANTE fell back after the start, continued to lack speed, improved inside of several rivals while three wide into the lane, flattened out a bit in the final furlong. TUCKER THE GRUMP also lacked any early foot, came four to five wide out of the turn, improved position a bit while not a serious threat. CORN SOUP within striking distance in the early going, had little left for the stretch run. LET HIM DO last away, raced well back, picked off some tiring rivals without menacing. IDE LIKE HAWAII fell back to trial, five wide out of the turn, passed tiring rivals, no real threat. CATINANDSCATIN mid pack, tired through the lane. JACKIE MOON pressed the pace outside, gave way. D W STRONG forwardly placed for a half, backed up through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Catinandscatin
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, tired stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Palante
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back after start, improved 3w into lane, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: In Detail
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, moved out, mid pack, late run outside, missed

ENTRY.NAME: D W Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed for a half, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Corn Soup
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, little left late

ENTRY.NAME: The Five B's
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 3w, bid, took over 1/8, dug in late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Joe B. Mulholland Jr., John P.Mulholland & Karen Mulhollan

ENTRY.NAME: Let Him Do
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, well back, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: G E H Giants Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, cleared early, pace, no match top two late

ENTRY.NAME: Tucker the Grump
ENTRY.COMMENT: near the back, 5w into the lane, improved, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Ide Like Hawaii
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, 5w, passed faltering rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Jackie Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside, gave way
